item.title: Back Brace Body Jacket
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Intended for folks with arthritis or instability of the lumbar spine. The additional support offers relief to lower back pain while limiting flexion, stretching, and bending. Assists in recovery with spondylolysis, herniated or bulging disc, lumbar fracture management, post-operative stabilization, and spinal stenosis.

The post Back Brace Body Jacket appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Full support for thoracic to lumbar region
  • Main Velcro® closure with three additional belts for optimal adjustment
  • Special poly insert for firm support
  • Keystone pad gives extra lumbar support

Waist Size
28″ – 32″ Small
32″ – 36″ Medium
36″ – 40″ Large
40″ – 44″ Extra Large
44″ – 48″ 2XL

The post Back Brace Body Jacket appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and…

The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and sprained ankles.
The Lace ankle support is perfect fit for use while playing basketball, running, soccer, volleyball ,football or any other sport. It is also ideal for post sports related injuries.

This ankle support product has plenty of lace to fit all sizes . This is the most stable and adjustable one, offering the best coverage ,also makes it the most comfortable, whether wearing it with shoes or not .

It locks your foot into position so you can walk without fear of further injury .

Features:

  • FIGURE 8 STRAP DESIGN: LACE ANKLE SUPPORT not only lace up nice and tight but the figure 8 strap design really stabilizes from rolling .
  • DISTINCTIVE DESIGN : Designed as a canvas construction by the professionals of AT Surgical.
  • DURABLE : To ensure it is durable, yet comfortable, providing stronger full around the ankle support and stability.
  • FULLY ADJUSTABLE :There is plenty of lace in order to fit all sizes .
  • STRONG LACES: The laces are strong enough to support for ultimate compression.
  • BILATERAL FIT: Our dynamic ankle supports are bilateral, meaning they can fit both your left and right foot.
  • Superior Quality : The product is MADE IN AMERICA, consulting professionals by AT Surgical, which means it ensures and abides by the supreme quality fit for patients’ rapid pain relief.

    • Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: LACE Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

    • Size

  • Sizes Available
  • (1 ) One SIZE Fits All
  • (2) Fits BOTH, LEFT or RIGHT Foot

    • The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE has been designed to stabilize ankle and heel so that injury is prevented. It aids as a tool…

The post Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE has been designed to stabilize ankle and heel so that injury is prevented. It aids as a tool to prevent injury and treat pain and inflammation related to high impact running, training and sporting. Compression provides soothing heat while promoting circulation for healing and the reduction of inflammation. Orthopedic immobilization limits excessive movement to prevent injury of lateral and medial collateral ligaments.

It is made with superior craftsmanship and examined by the highest standards in the industry to prevent irritation while ensuring proper placement with a snug, comfortable fit.

It supports weak ankles and heels for everyday aches and pains, weight training and sports. For the treatment and prevention of minor strains and sprains, arthritis, weak ankles and heels, muscle fatigue and more.

So, it is recommended by professionals to USE The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE to protect ankles, heels, Achilles’ tendon and ligaments.

Features:

  • Designed For Comfort: Designed and manufactured to prevent sprains, strains and other injuries while maximizing comfort.
  • Provides Added Stabilization and Support : This ankle brace have adjustable cross tension straps for added stabilization and support.
  • Unique design for full ankle support: It is uniquely designed to prevent sprains, strains and other injuries covering the patients’ full ankle.
  • Chamber filled with air and gel:. Air insert includes air tube to adjust for optimal fit and compression. Gel insert can be removed and chilled for cold therapy.
  • Use with your shoes on : This gives you the independence to wear your shoes as it has an open foot design that makes it breathable and comfortable.
  • Use for both Cold and Hot therapies : Can be used for both Cold/Hot therapies for prevention of ankle pain.Gel insert can be removed and chilled for cold therapy or microwaved for hot therapy.
  • Recommended by Professionals : ANKLE BRACEs are recommended for the treatment of pain related to sprains, strains, arthritis and excessive muscle joint movement, inflammation and injury in ankle ligaments.

Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: Air Gel Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • One Size Fits All

    • The post Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Erectus LSO Back Support Brace
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Are you suffering from lower back pain? The Erectus provides coverage from the sacral spine to the L5 vertebra, granting improved spinal stabilization and reduced strain. Equipped with rigid anterior & posterior removable panels. The mechanical advantage system utilizes bi-lateral tension straps, allowing a 6:1 pull ratio & giving positive patient compliance.

  • Reduces strain on discs
  • Diverts weight bearing forces to the lumbar spine area
  • Manages pain for improved quality of life

The post Erectus LSO Back Support Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Waist Size
32″ – 40″ Small & Medium
40″ – 48″ Large & XL
48″ – 56″ 2XL & 3XL

The post Erectus LSO Back Support Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Soft, comfortable, stretchable fabric tubing that is lined with a moisturizing gel pad that comforts and cushions sensitive corns and calluses. Can also be used to protect sore or tender spots on the finger. Absorbs shock and pressure better than less effective drugstore foam products that quickly wear out.

The post Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Tubing is cut-to-size for a custom fit – must be trimmed to meet individual sizing needs. Dermatologically tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. Two sizes- 20 mm and 35 mm. 20 mm is suitable for most fingers and toes. Use the 35 mm with the great toes or thumbs.

  • Guards against friction and painful irritation from overlapping or rubbing toes.
  • Elastic sleeve hugs the digit and stays put, so you can wear it in any shoe, closed or open toe, and also when barefoot/
  • Silicone gel cushioning helps prevent blistering and helps to relieve hot spots, such as painful warts, hard or soft corns.
  • Molds to the skin, insulating the sensitive area against shock and pressure.
  • Durable, washable (by hand) and reusable.
  • Cut-to-fit for custom length.

The post Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Womens Rib Belt | 6″ Wide | 4″ Tall Front | Universal
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
When you need stabilizing support for your injured ribs, wrap on our Rib Belt. Designed to help heal and support fractured or bruised ribs, this rib belt contours to your body for maximum comfort. The AT Surgical Rib Belt stabilizes the rib cage after injury or surgery and combines compression therapy and gentle support to your rib cage, allowing your ribs to safely heal.

The post Womens Rib Belt | 6″ Wide | 4″ Tall Front | Universal appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
About universal fit models:

If you aren’t sure what size you need and fall between measurements, the universal belt offers greater flexibility in accommodating a range of sizes. Rather than coming in 4 standard “true fit” sizes, our universal models come in 2 sizes (Small & Large) which are more generously cut to span across a wider range of sizes. For belts, wraps and binders, the universal model has a larger fastening panel for proper adjustment to achieve a customized fit.

The post Womens Rib Belt | 6″ Wide | 4″ Tall Front | Universal appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment.
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Specifically designed to provide stabilization and support to your sore rib cage to help treat injuries and pain caused by rib fractures, sprains, and more.…

The post Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment. appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Specifically designed to provide stabilization and support to your sore rib cage to help treat injuries and pain caused by rib fractures, sprains, and more. Hold the rib cage in the proper position and ensures proper posture while reducing everyday pain caused by sudden movements. This Rib Belt is prescribed for patients with injured broken ribs, and broken sternum while offering middle and upper back supports. This belt ensures superior stabilization and sustaining rib and sternum injuries. Following surgery and surgical incisions, this belt can also provide supporting pressure for the patient. Made of high-quality materials for optimal comfort and breathability.

Features:

  • Breathable bandage repeats your anatomical shape
  • Fits around your ribs precisely according to your body form
  • Effectively reduce any kind of chest pain after the local surgery or any other possible rib and sternum traumas
  • Comfortable help you to heal faster
  • Used as prevention against muscle overload during exercises
  • Designed To Treat & Protect:
  • Broken ribs
  • Sore or bruised rib cage
  • Cracked ribs
  • Intercostal muscle strain
  • Dislocated ribs

Specification:

  • Type: Belt
  • Color: White
  • Gender: Unisex
  • Body Part: Spinal Column
  • Structure: Flexible
  • Texture: Soft
  • Intended Use: Abdominal & Rib Support
  • Package includes: 1pc X Relive Rib Belt

Size

  • Size Available
  • S 27 – 32”
  • M 33 – 38”
  • L 39 – 44”
  • XL 45 – 50”

Directions: Simply wrap the rib binder around your chest directly below the breasts. Secure via Velcro closure to your desired compression level. Adjust as needed. For the women’s style, make sure the curved portion of the binder is centered underneath your breasts.

The post Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment. appeared first on AT Surgical.
